p: The mechanisms underlying allergic reactions to COVID‐19 vaccines remain poorly understood, and the number of documented cases is limited. Greenhawt et al. reported a very low incidence of vaccine‐associated anaphylaxis (7.91 per million doses) [5]. Lipid nanoparticles (LNPs), including polyethylene glycol and polysorbate, have been implicated in vaccine‐induced hypersensitivity and inflammatory reactions [5].
